--- update_fqn.sql
update sch1.foo set foo = bar, bar = foo, baz = DEFAULT where foo = 1
--- AST
&ast.Update{
  TableName: &ast.Path{
    Idents: []*ast.Ident{
      &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 7,
        NameEnd: 11,
        Name:    "sch1",
      },
      &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 12,
        NameEnd: 15,
        Name:    "foo",
      },
    },
  },
  Updates: []ast.UpdateItem{
    &ast.UpdateItemAssign{
      Path: []*ast.Ident{
        &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 20,
          NameEnd: 23,
          Name:    "foo",
        },
      },
      DefaultExpr: &ast.DefaultExpr{
        DefaultPos: -1,
        Expr:       &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 26,
          NameEnd: 29,
          Name:    "bar",
        },
      },
    },
    &ast.UpdateItemAssign{
      Path: []*ast.Ident{
        &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 31,
          NameEnd: 34,
          Name:    "bar",
        },
      },
      DefaultExpr: &ast.DefaultExpr{
        DefaultPos: -1,
        Expr:       &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 37,
          NameEnd: 40,
          Name:    "foo",
        },
      },
    },
    &ast.UpdateItemAssign{
      Path: []*ast.Ident{
        &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 42,
          NameEnd: 45,
          Name:    "baz",
        },
      },
      DefaultExpr: &ast.DefaultExpr{
        DefaultPos: 48,
        Default:    true,
      },
    },
  },
  Where: &ast.Where{
    Where: 56,
    Expr:  &ast.BinaryExpr{
      Op:   "=",
      Left: &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 62,
        NameEnd: 65,
        Name:    "foo",
      },
      Right: &ast.IntLiteral{
        ValuePos: 68,
        ValueEnd: 69,
        Base:     10,
        Value:    "1",
      },
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
UPDATE sch1.foo SET foo = bar, bar = foo, baz = DEFAULT WHERE foo = 1
